name: Where it will take us
description:
Welcome to this prototype of my first ever interactive story! 

This idea came as video game scenario. Since I've no game dev skills, I found out that this format would be something that could bring this idea quickly to the world.

I've been writing "classic" texts, but this is my first interactive, so I'm looking for feedback! 

Feedback can be on the story itself, but also the dynamics, the interactions, the looks or even grammar.

Software : Twine

Photos : Peter Herrmann, Andre Benz, via Unsplash
